channel.title: [Rel] Korasi sword
channel.description:
I made the model for Kaex and he said i should release it, so here you are. Its just the .mqo file you'll have to get ints and all that other stuff yourself. It works on 317 appearntly, so go for your life. :)
[b]Picture[/b]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/rssword.jpg[/img]
[b]Download link[/b]
[b]MQO file: [/b] http://uppit.com/qu3vnzldr6pd/models.rar
[b]Dat file: [/b] http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/korasi%20sword.zip

item.title: [Rel] Korasi sword
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

[quote=“nL, post:31, topic:386271”][quote author=enzo42 link=topic=482027.msg3577848#msg3577848 date=1303569534]
guys here are good ints, it makes the sword look good in inv:

INT:

if(i == ****) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = DROP;//drop class8.anInt181 = 1200; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset; class8.anInt194 = -1; // model offset; increase to move up class8.anInt165 = EQUIP; class8.anInt200 = EQUIP; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Korasi's sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a void knight.".getBytes(); class8.aByte205 = -11; class8.aByte154 = -11; }

PICTURE:

[/quote]

you wrote that in delta right?[/quote]
I lol’d at that comment xD

Read full topic

item.title: [Rel] Korasi sword
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“short_asian_kid, post:21, topic:386271”]You think you can make the modle go up a little bit? On my server, the sword is below the guys hand
And if you could make the sword a little bit thicker would be great as some angles it dissapears.
If not I understand though but please comment back.[/quote]

I had made it bigger for someone once before, but you’d have to move it via .MQO file yourself because you’d be better of. Seeing as i don’t know where it is on the client and all, it makes it harder for me to move it correctly. I’ll see if i still have the other file though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Rel] Korasi sword
item.dc:creator: @ReDDD ReDDD
item.description:
@ReDDD wrote:

Iv added, but when i wield it goes in wepon spot but it says unarmed, and its on floor when u walk. Could someone help me with the ints, this is mine atm:
case 15345:
itemDef.name = “Korasi’s sword”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 54496;
itemDef.anInt165 = 54495;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1400;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 700;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 60;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 25;
itemDef.description = “The sword of a Void Knight.”.getBytes(); break;

Thanks ( im not very experienced )

Read full topic
